textBeforeTable: Servings Per Container 45 Serving Size 2 Vcaps® Supplement Facts Super Colostrum Product Label: NOW Super Colostrum combines Colostrum with the herbal ingredients, Larch Arabinogalactan, Olive Leaf and Astragalus to provide healthy immune system support. Colostrum is a natural source of immunoglobulins IgG, IgM and IgA, which are important immunological proteins for both animals and humans. In addition, NOW has also included Eleuthero to support a healthy stress response. & Olive Leaf Extract and Astragalus Root With ImmunEnhancer Supports Healthy Immune Function Super Colostrum Product Description: If you are dissatisfied for any reason, we'll give you a full refund and pay return shipping. textAfterTable: *Percent Daily Values are based on 2,000 calorie diet. †Daily Value not established. Other Ingredients: Cellulose (capsule), Maltodextrin, Magnesium Stearate (vegetable source) and Silica. Suggested Usage: As a dietary supplement, take 2 Vcaps® 2 to 3 times daily, preferably before meals. Consider taking this product in combination with NOW® Immune Renew™, AlphaSorb-C™ and Respir-All™. WARNING: Do not take this product if you are pregnant, breast-feeding or have any history of autoimmune conditions without prior medical consultation. Please keep out of reach of children. Contains milk derivative. Contains no sugar, salt, yeast, wheat, gluten, soy, egg, shellfish or preservatives. Vcaps® is a registered trademark of Capsugel.
